meanings.definition: A person or thing that hovers.
meanings.sent1: The hoverers watched the birds fly high in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The group of hoverers stayed near the edge of the cliff.
meanings.sent3: The curious hoverers hovered around the magician's table, trying to see the trick.
meanings.sent4: The hoverers in the garden resembled colorful butterflies flitting from flower to flower.
meanings.sent5: The hoverers in the forest moved silently, blending in with the trees.

meanings.sent1: The hoverers waited patiently for the signal to move forward.
meanings.sent2: The crowd of hoverers gathered around the street performer.
meanings.sent3: The hoverers at the party kept changing their minds about which game to play.
meanings.sent4: The hoverers in the room seemed to be suspended in mid-air, lost in thought.
meanings.sent5: The group of hoverers circled above the field, unsure of where to land.
